Properties.ProtectedString:
--Stickmasterluke
sp=script.Parent
r=game:service("RunService") debris=game:GetService("Debris")
anims={"RightSlash","LeftSlash"}
basedamage=2 beardamage=5 armdamage=25 damage=basedamage
basearmhold=CFrame.new(-1,0,.3)*CFrame.Angles(-.1,0,3)
function waitfor(parent,name) while true do local child=parent:FindFirstChild(name) if child~=nil then return child end wait() end end
waitfor(sp,"Handle") waitfor(sp.Handle,"Mesh") waitfor(sp,"RunAnim") waitfor(sp,"Taunting") waitfor(sp,"LeftSlash") waitfor(sp,"RightSlash") waitfor(sp,"Taunt")
local SlashSound=Instance.new("Sound") SlashSound.SoundId="rbxasset://sounds\\swordslash.wav" SlashSound.Parent=sp.Handle SlashSound.Volume=.7
local UnsheathSound=Instance.new("Sound") UnsheathSound.SoundId="http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=85004909" UnsheathSound.Parent=sp.Handle UnsheathSound.Volume=1
sp.Taunting.Value=false
function blow(weapon,hit) if weapon and hit and weapon.Parent~=nil and hit.Parent~=nil then if weapon~=sp.Handle then local aw=sp.Handle:FindFirstChild("LeftArmWeld") if aw==nil or aw.Part1~=weapon then return end end local humanoid=hit.Parent:findFirstChild("Humanoid") local vCharacter=sp.Parent local vPlayer=game.Players:playerFromCharacter(vCharacter) local hum=vCharacter:findFirstChild("Humanoid") local aw=sp.Handle:FindFirstChild("LeftArmWeld") if humanoid~=nil and humanoid.Health>0 then if hum~=nil and humanoid~=hum then local right_arm=vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Right Arm") if right_arm~=nil then local joint=right_arm:FindFirstChild("RightGrip") if joint~=nil and (joint.Part0==sp.Handle or joint.Part1==sp.Handle) then local t=hit.Parent:FindFirstChild("Torso") if hit.Name=="Left Arm" and t~=nil then local ls=t:FindFirstChild("Left Shoulder") if ls then if ls.Part0==hit or ls.Part1==hit then local la=hit local takearm=true local aw=sp.Handle:FindFirstChild("LeftArmWeld") if aw~=nil then if aw.Part1~=nil and aw.Part1.Parent~=nil then takearm=false else aw:remove() end end if takearm then la:BreakJoints() local w=Instance.new("Motor") w.Name="LeftArmWeld" w.MaxVelocity=.4 w.Part0=sp.Handle w.Part1=la w.C0=basearmhold w.C1=CFrame.new(0,.8,0) w.Parent=sp.Handle la.Touched:connect(function(hit2) blow(la,hit2) end) sp.RunAnim.Value="OverHeadSwing" UnsheathSound:play() end end end end tagHumanoid(humanoid,vPlayer) damage=basedamage if not sp.Enabled then if weapon~=sp.Handle then damage=armdamage else damage=beardamage end end humanoid:TakeDamage(damage) end end end end end end
function tagHumanoid(humanoid,player) for i,v in ipairs(humanoid:GetChildren()) do if v.Name=="creator" then v:remove() end end local creator_tag=Instance.new("ObjectValue") creator_tag.Value=player creator_tag.Name="creator" creator_tag.Parent=humanoid debris:AddItem(creator_tag,1) end
sp.Enabled=true function onActivated() if sp.Enabled and not sp.Taunting.Value then sp.Enabled=false local character=sp.Parent; local humanoid=character.Humanoid if humanoid==nil then return end SlashSound:play() newanim=anims[math.random(1,#anims)] while newanim==sp.RunAnim.Value do newanim=anims[math.random(1,#anims)] end sp.RunAnim.Value=newanim local aw=sp.Handle:FindFirstChild("LeftArmWeld") if aw~=nil then aw.DesiredAngle=-.5 if newanim=="LeftSlash" then aw.C0=basearmhold*CFrame.Angles(-.3,0,0) elseif newanim=="RightSlash" then aw.C0=basearmhold*CFrame.Angles(.3,0,0) end end wait(.5) local aw=sp.Handle:FindFirstChild("LeftArmWeld") if aw~=nil then aw.DesiredAngle=1 end wait(.5) local aw=sp.Handle:FindFirstChild("LeftArmWeld") if aw~=nil then aw.DesiredAngle=0 aw.C0=basearmhold end sp.Enabled=true end end
function onEquipped() UnsheathSound:play() end
sp.Activated:connect(onActivated) sp.Equipped:connect(onEquipped)
sp.Handle.Touched:connect(function(hit) blow(sp.Handle,hit) end)

--Stickmasterluke --A nice simple axe
local sp=script.Parent
enabled=true taunting=false
function waitfor(parent,name) while true do local child=parent:FindFirstChild(name) if child~=nil then return child end wait() end end
waitfor(sp,"Handle") waitfor(sp.Handle,"Mesh") waitfor(sp,"RunAnim") waitfor(sp,"Taunting") waitfor(sp,"LeftSlash") waitfor(sp,"RightSlash") waitfor(sp,"Taunt")
sp.Handle.Mesh.Scale=Vector3.new(1.3,1.3,1.3)
function onButton1Down(mouse) if not enabled then return end enabled=false mouse.Icon="rbxasset://textures\\GunWaitCursor.png" wait(1.25) mouse.Icon="rbxasset://textures\\GunCursor.png" enabled=true end
function swordUp() --sp.Grip=CFrame.new(.15,-2,0)*CFrame.Angles(0,math.pi/2,0) end
function swordOut() --sp.Grip=(CFrame.new(.15,-2,0)*CFrame.Angles(0,math.pi/2,0))*CFrame.Angles(math.pi/4,.4,0) end
function onEquippedLocal(mouse) local currentlast=lastequipped if mouse==nil then print("Mouse not found") return end mouse.Icon="rbxasset://textures\\GunCursor.png" mouse.Button1Down:connect(function() onButton1Down(mouse) end) local plr=game.Players.LocalPlayer if plr~=nil then if plr.Character~=nil then local ra=plr.Character:FindFirstChild("Right Arm") if ra~=nil then ra.Transparency=1 end end end end
function onUnequippedLocal(mouse) local currentlast=lastequipped local plr=game.Players.LocalPlayer if plr~=nil then if plr.Character~=nil then local ra=plr.Character:FindFirstChild("Right Arm") if ra~=nil then ra.Transparency=0 end end end end
sp.Equipped:connect(onEquippedLocal) sp.Unequipped:connect(onUnequippedLocal)
while sp:FindFirstChild("RunAnim")==nil do wait() end sp.RunAnim.Changed:connect(function() local h=sp.Parent:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") local t=sp.Parent:FindFirstChild("Torso") local anim=sp:FindFirstChild(sp.RunAnim.Value) if anim and t and h then theanim=h:LoadAnimation(anim) if theanim and h.Health>0 then theanim:Play() if sp.RunAnim.Value=="OverHeadSwing" then wait(.25) swordOut() wait(.5) swordUp() end end end end)
